title: AN ACT proposing to create a new section of the Constitution of Kentucky relating to the possession of cannabis.
subject: Cannabis
Constitution, Ky.
Corrections Impact
Drugs and Medicines
General Assembly
Licensing
Local Mandate
Secretary of State

abstracts.abstract: Propose to create a new section of the Constitution of Kentucky to guarantee the right of an individual 21 years of age or older to possess, use, buy, or sell one ounce or less of cannabis and to cultivate, harvest, and store up to five cannabis plants for personal use; grant the General Assembly control over the production, processing, and sale of cannabis and cannabis-derived products; designate the ballot question; direct the Secretary of State to publish the proposed amendment in a newspaper of general circulation; direct the Secretary of State to certify the proposed amendment to the county clerk of each county.

actions.description: to Elections, Const. Amendments & Intergovernmental Affairs (H)
